title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.11? Click Here!
body:
*Hey all,*

*Patch 5.11 is upon us! If you're having problems downloading the latest patch, we got you covered!  Below you can find solutions to the most common issues that you may be experiencing.*

-----------------------------------------

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: My league updater as went down to 0kbps. I don't know what to do and I've tried everything in the Permissions Article and have tried running it as an administrator, any other ideas on how to fix this?  It'd be much appreciated.
Same man,  I sent a ticket and asked for help but I got nothing, usually stops at 70 - 79 percent
This is happening to me also.
Our Teams usually respond in a couple of hours, but you will get a response within 24 hours if you haven't received one already.  Just sit tight for now!

mine does the same thing though i found that if i am using my wired connection, the patch wont download.. if i switch over to my wireless connection on the same router, it downloads fully. not sure why this is the case but if you have wireless available, try disabling the wired connection and see if that works. after which you can re enable the wired connection for when you play.

replies.poster: G O T N O S U
replies.body: I am having the same problem it has been like 5 hours and it was only at 7% so i restarted client and its doing it all over again. It usually downloads in like 5 minutes

Wrenchman Wuks reporting for duty! Remember, be sure to try the steps in the [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) before posting a reply. Typically, we pull our solutions from there when players ask about a patching-related issue. If those solutions don't help you, please attach a patcher log to identify any issues. 

You can find your patcher logs in your **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs** folder (attach the one without the Ux on it). You can attach the log by clicking the paperclip/attachment icon next to the POST button, and dragging any log(s) in the new window.

my lol client says 0.28mb(32% completed)  remaining and a new dialogue  box appears saying unspecified error occured.
i have attached  the patcherlog file below

Heya **silvermoon24**,

Sometimes you just have to wait out the duration of the patch, as certain stages in the patching process don't download additional files as files are moved from one folder to another. However, in this case, you'll want to go to 
> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln

delete the folder, and re-run the client to force a repatch.

hey,
Thanks for such a fast reply  :) 
i have deleted that folder and re run the client
but still im getting same error at 0.28 mb remaining (32%) 
Have attached the new patcher log in case if you need it.

Seems like an Adobe Air related issue. Try this solution instead:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5

If that doesn't work, we can try something else!

hi,
 i followed the steps given in the above link.
it worked.
it forced a repatch again
But this time i m getting same error(unspecified error) at 1mb remaining(last time it was 028 mb).
Now, can you try the solution that I listed first? I think that should do it.

i already deleted it(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln).
i followed all these (Adobe air issue) steps after deleting it .
i ran the repatch and i got this error.
 i am actually using my 4g mobile wifi connection.
i will try to run repatch in wired connection.
Thank you anyways,
i have attached the recent patch log if u want to have a look at
The thing is that I may have mixed up the order, but if the folder doesn't exist, we can look at alternative solutions.

so i tried downloading again with wired connection and issuie till persists :(
alternative solutions ??....plz!!
i am so deperate  to play the game(after this jayce changes)

Gotcha!

> S O L U T I O N = 
> RADS/system/launcher.cfg
> Change
> airConfigProject=lol_air_client_config_na
> TO
> airConfigProject=lol_air_client_config_eu
> 
> A N D 
> 
> RADS/system/system.cfg 
> Change REGION = NA TO REGION = EU

but there seems to be no region named eu
There is euw and east europe .
so should i run repatch in these serevers?

i am having the same issue as silvermoon here and i've done all the fixes listed with no avail i also reinstalled which it started giving me the same issue at 32 percent but it stopped at 23 patches
here's an image for what exactly happened
Wrenchman Elduris here, I'll be monitoring the thread as well! ^_^

0 kbps 99% 277 mb tried solutions and didn't work , at first it got stuck at 33% and i reinstall again then stopped i tried repair, it went again to 33% now waiting since two hours 99% stills plz help{{summoner:3}}
I get scanning files and it just scans forever :/ ( left it for about 45 minutes and was still scanning files)

I wish mine would work, but it's not. I really wanna do my placements today. :'( I am having the same problem as you ohtomo jin, i am so anxious to play my first ever ranked matches and i wanna see how ill do

Hey Ohtomo Jin! 

If your patcher starts scanning files, it's checking to make sure there aren't any corruptions in your game files. Please let it finish and don't close the patcher, or you could be met with even longer wait times next time you open the client!
I had the same problem, it is approaching 12,500 files now, I have no idea why this is happening, but today is the day i was gonna do my placement matches too. :(

I can't go into games after champion select. after the timer hotis zero teh client closes to my taskbar and when i re-open it says that game is still in progress. so i can't join the game. then i close my launcher and restart LoL, i get the try reconnect screen but if i click on reconnect nothing happens. i tried playing lol on our crappy pc with same wifi(cables) and it works. only problem on the laptop i have 2 fps. SoOoOoOo pLz help me? i want to play league again.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hi all, i recently reset my computer, and as I went to reinstall league, I kept getting stuck. On the top of the screen, it said: "Step 2/2: Updating League of Legends: 277 Mb (0KBps) 99%". It was like that overnight, so I retried it a bunch of times. I got stuck on 33%, 34%, 75%, and 99%. Please help, im losing my mind not being able to play!{{summoner:31}}

> [{quoted}](name=PatatoBacca,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEJc5XaH,comment-id=0040,timestamp=2015-06-15T03:16:25.235+0000)
>
> Hi all, i recently reset my computer, and as I went to reinstall league, I kept getting stuck. On the top of the screen, it said: "Step 2/2: Updating League of Legends: 277 Mb (0KBps) 99%". It was like that overnight, so I retried it a bunch of times. I got stuck on 33%, 34%, 75%, and 99%. Please help, im losing my mind not being able to play!{{summoner:31}}

So what keeps happening is it will run fine, (1000-10000 KBps) until around 33%- 55%. Here, the percent appears to freeze, but the KBps keeps on fluctuating normally. After about half an hour, the percent jumps forward a lot (25%-35%), and then the KBps slowly drops to 0, around 75-99%. This happens no matter what i do, what fix i try, this keeps happening. I've even reset my computer, and it still happens.
Can someone please tell me what this means?

> [{quoted}](name=schweiny91,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEJc5XaH,comment-id=0028,timestamp=2015-06-12T01:17:31.337+0000)
>
> Can someone please tell me what this means?

The log files show all kinds of files are failing their validation. They are fine on most people's computers. I doubt the files are bad on Riot's servers, but it's easy to blame them.

My guess is you have something messing up your downloads from their server. 

Post a traceroute to 192.64.174.69

Try to...

Disable the IP Helper service: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Try disabling IPv6 using the registry.

Are you on Windows 8...

Disable IPv6: http://www.techunboxed.com/2012/08/how-to-disable-ipv6-in-windows-8.html
Then reboot and start LoL.

Are you on Windows 7...

Disable IPv6: http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9728869
Then reboot and start LoL.

What antivirus/antispyware programs do you use? Have you tried to disable them?

If you still have issues with lag or getting disconnected, run a test at http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ . On the results page you get to after running a test at http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ , do a control-A to select all text, do a control-C to copy the text, open notepad or another text editor, do a control-V to paste the results. Delete everything before the Summary of Noteworthy Events near the top, delete everything after Feedback near the bottom, and then Control-A to select all, Control-C to copy, and Control-V to paste those results here on the Boards.

Try installing ( https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5638 ) and rebooting and trying LoL again.

If something fixes your issue, please reply so other people can learn from your experience.
Tried it and it didnt fix it unfortunately
What issues are you having? Can you try running League of Legends as an Administrator? Just right click the icon and click "Run as Administrator".
did that too, it downloads the 200 MB almost all the way then when there is 1 MB left it fails

Hey schweiny91!

I took a look at your patcher log, but getting some additional context will help a lot.  To that end...what type of error or issue do you encounter exactly?  If you get a specific error message, could you take a screenshot and attach it here?  We should be able to look into it a bit further!

when it first ran it scanned files downloaded the update down to bout 1.00 MB and then the Update Failed unspecified error pops up and it's stuck at 32% it seems, Ive played fine before the update also
Ive repatched it as well and it fails at the same spot

ok so my updater has given me the error to check logs, so i thought i might have to reinstall it. so i did happened again and reinstalled it again.. then it went down to 0 kbps at around 85% but slowly (and i mean really slowly) the download bar kept moving and has currently stopped at 99%. (I'm using my Ethernet connection) i still got the check patcher logs message. I have checked the logs folder and I've got a total of 3 patcher logs (ill screeenshot that) and ill attach the most recent one
I have to close the updater now because it is simply draining my net usage even though it is stuck on 99% with 0 kbps and 277 mb to go
I'm having the same problem 0 kbps 277 mb 99% and it took very long time that's terrible could you help please ? anyone !!
so i tried to attach the most recent one out of the 3 but the most recent 2 are to big so the one attached is the oldest one (11:23 am today)

reinstalling won't actually help take it from me
you'll get the same issue while installing it'll go to 0kbs around 32 close and restart then it'll do it at a later point in the installation
So I read this crazy long ass forum to find that there's still no answer to this. fml.
Could you help explain a bit more what your specific problem is?  Depending on the specific error or issue you are encountering, we might be able to help!
There was also an adobe flash player update two days ago btw...

> [{quoted}](name=imsogaysu,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEJc5XaH,comment-id=0030,timestamp=2015-06-12T05:00:14.186+0000)
>
> There was also an adobe flash player update two days ago btw...

Are you still having issues? Do you have Skype? Its really hard to help people with these issues on the boards  when they are complicated.
Patcher log attached. Same problem I had last night when I tried to update for the first time since 5.10. Got to 2.34mb left, Unspecified error. Any help?

Hey Sevilonshadow!

Unspecified error usually only pops up when there is an issue connecting to our Patcher Servers.  It can be hard to pinpoint exactly why the connection to these servers fail.  Because of that, I want to confirm that you have tried all of the steps in our [Connection Issues KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has the most common solutions to get this fixed ASAP.
Everything except disabling IPv6. Just find it odd I can download everything in step 1 except the last 2.34mb without issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Sevilonshadow,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEJc5XaH,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-06-10T18:13:13.410+0000)
>
> Everything except disabling IPv6. Just find it odd I can download everything in step 1 except the last 2.34mb without issue.

Try disabling IPv6 using the registry.

Are you on Windows 8...

Disable IPv6: http://www.techunboxed.com/2012/08/how-to-disable-ipv6-in-windows-8.html
Then reboot and start LoL.

Are you on Windows 7...

Disable IPv6: http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9728869
Then reboot and start LoL.


I did it myself and it fixed my LoL issues. It has also fixed problems for other people posting in the forums. It's weird the client has this issue though since Adobe Air has supposedly supported IPv6 since 2010 (https://www.adobe.com/support/documentation/en/air/2/releasenotes_users.html).
Ok, even with IPv6 off, still not getting past 32%, 2.34mb left to download.
